context:
|  | 2019 | (Restated) 2018
--- | --- | --- | ---
 | Note | £m | £m
Staff costs | 7 | (56.0) | (54.5)
Contractor costs |  | (0.4) | (0.4)
Depreciation of property, plant and equipment | 14 | (4.9) | (4.9)
Amortisation of intangible assets | 13 | (4.0) | (4.1)
Profit on sale of property, plant and equipment |  | 0.1 | –

paragraph 1: 6. Operating profit
paragraph 2: The Group has identified a number of items which are material due to the significance of their nature and/or amount. These are listed separately here to provide a better understanding of the financial performance of the Group:
paragraph 3: Following the application of IFRS 16, depreciation of property, plant and equipment has been restated for the year ended 31 March 2018 (note 2).

qa.question: Why are some of the items identified by the group considered material?
qa.answer: ['due to the significance of their nature and/or amount. These are listed separately here to provide a better understanding of the financial performance of the Group']
